items.q: Which of these classic 1980s movies was directed by Steven Spielberg?
items.explanation: Spielberg produced the other three, but he personally directed E.T.

items.q: In the TV series 'The Office' (US), Jim Halpert originally started working at the Scranton branch as a temp.
items.explanation: Ryan Howard was the temp. Jim Halpert was a full-time salesman from the very first episode.

items.q: The iconic Nirvana album 'Nevermind' features a naked baby swimming towards a dollar bill on its cover.
items.explanation: The 1991 album cover is one of the most recognizable in rock history.

items.q: Which author created the expansive fictional universe of 'A Song of Ice and Fire'?
items.explanation: The incredibly detailed fantasy novels were explicitly adapted into the HBO hit 'Game of Thrones'.

items.q: What fast-paced 2015 action film featured famously practical stunts, heavily modified vehicles, and Tom Hardy replacing Mel Gibson?
items.explanation: Directed by George Miller, it was universally critically championed for its relentless action.

items.q: In 'The Lord of the Rings', what is the name of the terrifying, fiery demon Gandalf battles in the mines of Moria?
items.explanation: Gandalf famously commands the ancient beast 'You shall not pass!' before facing it.

items.q: What acclaimed AMC television series followed the complex life of 1960s advertising executive Don Draper?
items.explanation: The critically lauded show rigorously explored office politics, changing social mores, and personal identity.

items.q: Which rapper released the critically and commercially massive 2010 album 'My Beautiful Dark Twisted Fantasy'?
items.explanation: It is widely considered his magnum opus and one of the greatest rap albums of the 21st century.

items.q: What extremely popular fantasy tabletop role-playing game experienced a massive cultural resurgence in the late 2010s?
items.explanation: Shows like 'Stranger Things' and live-play streams like 'Critical Role' heavily fueled its modern revival.

items.q: Which actor fundamentally redefined the Joker with his posthumous Academy Award-winning performance in 'The Dark Knight'?
items.explanation: His terrifying deeply anarchic portrayal remains heavily critically praised and iconic.
